vote.title: To authorize the Director of Finance and Management, on behalf of the Office of Construction Management, to enter into a construction contract with R.W. Setterlin Building Co. for the Council Chambers Renovation Phase 2 Project; to authorize a transfer and expenditure up to $407,437.00 within the Construction Management Capital Improvement Fund; to authorize an amendment to the 2022 Capital Improvements Budget; and to declare an emergency.    ($407,437.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
